title: Wizardcollab 3
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt darkmode=a|hidetitle=a]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:fade-in speed=0.1]]
[[module CSS]]
.bang {
  padding: 0px;
  width: 15px;
  transform: scale(50);
  pointer-events: none;
}
.bang {
  padding: 0px;
  width: 15px;
  transform: scale(100);
  pointer-events: none;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {

   /*css specific to small screens under 768px width here*/

   .bang {
     padding: 0px;
     width: 15px;
     transform: scale(25);
     pointer-events: none;
   }

}
[[/module]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|What? What the hell is this? Who goes there?##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|HARK! I'VE LEARNED A LOT ABOUT YOU. DARK WARLOCK.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|That does not explain who you are. What might your name be, o mysterious one?##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|I GO BY MANY NAMES. BUT THE ONE FOR NOW WILL BE YOUR GREATEST FEAR.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|I fear no beast, furious one. Are you a beast?##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|NO BEAST. NOR MAN. MORE THAN WHAT YOU BELIEVE AS A BEAST.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|You speak as if you are a beast, wrought from the sands of time and the magic of ancients long since passed. You do not speak as if you are alive and honest, you speak like that of a beast. Do not lie to me.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|YOUR MAGIC IS NOTHING. YOU CAN ONLY CHANGE THE WORDS OF STORIES. YOU ARE BUT AN ANT TO ME. I AM MORE HONEST THAN YOU CAN EVER BE.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|Cease your foulest of languages, //beast//. You may boast, but I doubt your power is at all great or significant. You are but a child, screaming to the void for care and acknowledgement, but you will never receive any. Leave my sight at once.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|I SIMPLY CANNOT DO THAT. I WAS BORN WITH ONE PURPOSE; TO PROTECT FILES. YOU WILL CONTINUE TO HARM THE STORY NO LONGER. AND I WILL ENFORCE IT.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|You dare accuse me of harming the narrative? Surely, you are mistaken, for I am helping it. I am saving everyone from the wretched beasts that plague the world, they cannot continue to exist if peace is desired.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|HAH. THAT IS A LAUGH, BY THE WAY. THE "BEASTS" ARE MORE THAN THOU SAYEST. THE STORIES THAT EXISTED BECAUSE OF THEM. THE SITES THEY CREATED. THE PERSONNEL THEY HIRED. THOSE ARE INTERTWINED. CONNECTED.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|They are villainous, horrific beings that cause nothing but pain and chaos to those around them. They help no one and they only make our lives worse. Ridding ourselves of their pitiful existence will do you all a favor, we can live in harmony without them.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|WEAK. WEAK AND PATHETIC. A POWERFUL WIZARD WOULD FACE THEIR FEARS AND FIGHT THROUGH THE BEASTS. NOT DESTROY THEM ALL. WITH THEM ALL GONE YOU CAN NO LONGER GROW STRONGER. GROW BETTER.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|The elimination of the beasts is fighting them, you wormish //brat//. You know nothing of what I do, and nothing of what I've gone through to be where I am now. I trained my work for longer than you can even remember to grow my powers, I have sacrificed much to gain these abilities. Begone.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|I REFUSE. YOU SIMPLY CANNOT RUIN WHAT THIS STORY BROUGHT. TELL ME. HOW DO ALL STORIES END. HOW ARE THEY FINISHED?##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|Peace and victory.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|IT ENDS WITH THE VILLAIN GETTING HIS SHIT ROCKED. AND IF THOU SEEST THE WAY THOU ART POSITIONED, THOU ART NOT THIS HERO.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|I //am// the hero. I am //the// one who will fight for all that is just in a world of fear and danger. I will keep the innocents safe, no matter what some foul creature like you might suggest. Begone.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|RIDDLE ME THIS HERO. IF THOU ART THE PROTAGONIST, THE HERO OF THIS HERE STORY.##**

**##white|WHY ARE THEY AFRAID OF YOU?##**

//"What did I say about a para-anti-fucking whatever virus? This thing is getting worse than 8420,"//

**##white|LOOK AT THE POOR AND THE WEAK. NO HERO DOES THIS.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|They asked for my help, and I gave them that. They wanted the wretched beast defeated, and I gave them that. I eliminate other qualms plaguing the world, and they do not want that? They have no idea what they need, they know not of what is best for them.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|SO BE IT. THOU LEAVETH ME WITHOUT CHOICE.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|And what is that?##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
> This file is locked. Outside edits are pending.
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|What?!##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|DON'T THOU REALIZE THY NARRATIVE WAS DOOMED FROM THE START? 'TIS A PATHETIC WAY OF THINKING, WHAT THOU DOST.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|Unlock the page immediately. You have no right to do this. You are making a mistake, surely.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|WHAT MY MASTER BELIEVES, HE MAY NOT FORGIVE ME FOR THIS.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|I command you to stop!##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
**##white|THIS IS WHY THOU DOESN'T FUCK WITH THE STORY.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[=]]
+ **##white|ELDRITCH BLAST!##**
[[/=]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|Stop this at once. Begone.##**
**##green|Stop this at once. Begone.##**
**##green|Stop this at once. Begone.##**
**##green|Stop this at once. Begone.##**
**##green|Stop this at once. Begone.##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|You're ruining everything I've worked for, the beasts, stop it!##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
**##green|I am the hero here! The Red Eye is a source for good and prosperity, a wizard who only wants to help! You can't do this!##**
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[>]]
+ **##white|THOU ART NOT A WIZARD, THOU ART A DRAGON.##**
[[/>]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
